segments.text: That's the transfer completed . Can I do anything else for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I want to deposit some money into my Savings Account , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could I have your Savings Book and the money , please . You are making a deposit of 800 RIB , is that correct ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please enter your PIN number on the keypad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There we go . Thanks very much .
segments.speaker: S2
